page.title: 20MY DAY IN KINGSCLERE SCHOOL
page.content: (continued from Page 19) At 10.00 it's assembly. This ends at 10.30, then we go straight out to play. After play we write a story. Usually we are told what to write about. At 12.15 we go to dinner, and play outside until 1.15. In the afternoon we work on topics or science or Religilous Education. We have another playtime at 2.15, do more work or hear a story, and go home at 3.30. I walk home with my friend, and if it's not raining I go to her house. I amuse myself until 6.30. This is my tea time. After tea I watch "Coronation Street" and "Dallas" on the television, and then I go to bed.
